projects.title: PetClinic  - Reactive Veternarian Web service
projects.bodyText:
- A class project in which we created a service where vets and customers can create appointments and vets can organize dates, perscriptions and customers 
 
 - Using: Java, Springboot, MongoDB, React and Docker 
 with agile and scrum methodology.

projects.title: Atelier Mechanique - Reactive mequanic web service
projects.bodyText:
- A website where users can send invoices and have a database of their clients and vehicles, and where customers can make Appointments. Admin can manage their business more efficiently and also allow customers for a more seamless interaction with the system and business.Also allows customers an easier access to the business. 
 
 - This project exists to showcase our skill in full stack development by being able to provide a  client with a seamless system to manage their business in a efficient and modern fashion bringing the business into the modern age

projects.title: MVVM IOS Application using Persistence and API
projects.bodyText:
- An App where users browse through different TV shows, add them to a watchlist and give a star rating and written review.
 
 - All data is saved to a firebase database.

- Showcases different animes, genres and a variety of amazing content for users to view.
 Uses features like search, and allows users to create their own lists and categories

projects.title: PHP-Chatroom
projects.bodyText:
- A php-chatroom where two users can communicate back and forth on different machines mimcking modern chat rooms.

- Given a vintage touch and design meant to replicate the nostlaigc feeling of early 2000's chat rooms like MSN

projects.title: IoT Home Invasion Security System
projects.bodyText: - A system that detects motion and sound between certain decibels and intervals that alerts the user and organizes the data inside a database while also using JSON Formatting.

projects.title: First Person Shooter Video Game
projects.bodyText:
- A 3D first person shooter survuival video game where the player shoots robots that attack and shoot at them.

- With different game modes, weapons and timers for a challenging and unique experience.
This project was a gorup collaboration bringing in a team of unique people with different skillsets to contribute to the creation of this game.
